channel.title: I downloaded source and a client but
channel.description:
the client wont run it says
Client is loading.... ------------------------------ 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue...
the code in my client.bat is @echo off COLOR 09 title DanneScape client V1 @echo Client Is loading...... @echo ----------------------- java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32 pause
is that correct and what other info do you need to help me

item.title: I downloaded source and a client but
item.dc:creator: @xxdarkdannexx xxdarkdannexx
item.description:
@xxdarkdannexx wrote:

the client wont run it says

Client is loading…

‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
press any key to continue…

the code in my client.bat is
@echo off
COLOR 09
title DanneScape client V1
@echo Client Is loading…
@echo -----------------------
java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32
pause

is that correct and what other info do you need to help me
